Name: Mythic Prelude - Concept Demo
About the game: On a night with the sound of rain pelting the roof with the intermittent roars of thunder, Simon Gram awakens in a home that he has never seen that houses furniture larger than practical for a person of normal size, and dangers unknown. All he finds are the journals of Tlaloc, a hero that he had always admired that towered above all. From his slumber, he finds a sword and a talking raven. He must fight to survive the night, and escape the dangers of the mysterious home! Fast-paced overhead combat with an intricate bullet-hell style multi-phased boss and two mini-bosses! Platforming from an overhead perspective! Acquire progression abilities from killing bosses! A beautifully orchestrated soundtrack by The Noble Demon!
